body.motivation: The net worth sessions view is designed to help you analyze your earnings during your gaming session without the influence of your current net worth and its price fluctuations. Net worth sessions are completely isolated from the outside. Each profile can have one session. These sessions are isolated from each other even with the same stash tabs.
body.initial_step: A net worth session is similar to the normal view. However, you always start from scratch. Any items you add or remove to an active session are displayed. Items that you remove during an active session without having added them are displayed negatively. Any items you add or remove to an inactive session will not be added or removed. There are four different states for this. Online: If you start or continue the session. The session duration timer counts up. Pause: If the session is active again or you pause the session. Offline: The time while the app is closed while the session is active. Inactive: If you switch to another profile.
body.income_switch: Clicking this button will switch the income calculation.
body.session_duration_step: Here you can see your current session duration.
body.session_started_at_step: All time calculation is based on this session start.
body.session_duration_history_chart_step: Here you can see your net worth and income for the respective status. So online, paused, offline and inactive.
body.session_duration_history_pie_chart_step: Here you can see a summary of your times by states.
body.manual_adjustment_step: Here you can manually adjust your session duration so that the income is not calculated incorrectly if you forgot to switch to pause.
body.profile_step: If you switch to another profile with an inactive session, the session will be paused and any items you added or removed during inactivity will be subtracted with the first snapshot taken (after 30s).
body.snapshot_step: Snapshots are saved in parallel for both the current session and the normal view. If you delete a snapshot for the session, the charts will be recalculated!
body.overlay_step: The overlay always shows the stats for the current view.
body.group_step: Unfortunately, groups are not supported at the moment. Snapshots are not currently being uploaded. They are only for your current client locally saved.

body2.session_duration_history_chart_step: Note: You can click snapshots (circles) for time travel views. All views are then recalculated and show the state when the snapshot was taken. If you click the snapshot again or if the snapshot is no longer visible in the timeline, all views are reset to the current state (the latest snapshot). You can zoom the x-Axis for the selection or click a marker that selects the snapshot it's based on.
body2.session_duration_history_pie_chart_step: This and the other chart are updated every 10 seconds.
